full_summary:
**Opportunity Notice for the Procurement of Non-Metallic Hoses and Hose Assemblies**

**Title and Reference Information**
* English Title: Non-metallic Hoses and Hose Assemblies
* French Title: Tuyaux et Assemblages de Tuyaux Non Métalliques
* Reference Number: CB-8381-97717059
* Solicitation Number: W8482-241733/A
* Amendment Number: 6

**Tender Information**
* Publication Date: August 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 11, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A
* Tender Status: Expiration (closed to bidding)

**Procurement Details**
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others

**Delivery and End Use**
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Halifax, Nova Scotia and British Columbia
* End Use: The goods and services are required for the Department of National Defence

**Contracting Entity Information**
* Contracting Entity Name: National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
The department has a requirement for non-metallic hoses and hose assemblies as per the specifications outlined below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

* Item 1: Hose Assembly, Non-Metallic, 14 EA, Part No.: 1683-30, NCAGE: 35062
* Item 2: Hose Assembly, Non-Metallic, 10 EA, Part No.: 1683-30, NCAGE: 35062
* Item 3: Hose, Non-Metallic, 7 LG, Part No.: 2580-32-06000, NCAGE: 01276
* Item 4: Hose, Non-Metallic, 4 LG, Part No.: 2580-32-06000, NCAGE: 01276
* Item 5: Hose Assembly, Non-Metallic, 2 EA, Part No.: 010904R.D
